video.title: Sofia the First
video.synopsis: When her commoner mother marries the king, average-girl Sofia finds that being a real princess isn't all it's cracked up to be.

episodes.synopsis: Sofia and her family go to the Flying Royal Derby. The little princess is excited to see the event and even decides to participate.
episodes.title: Just One of the Princes

episodes.synopsis: It's Sofia's first royal slumber party and Amber invites the other princesses to the event. Sofia invites her friends from town.
episodes.title: The Big Sleepover

episodes.synopsis: Sofia enters the cave where the Trolls live. King Roland tells her that the Trolls can never leave their caves.
episodes.title: Let the Good Times Troll

episodes.synopsis: Sofia has a big test coming up in her spellcasting classes, but she can't seem to get the spell down, so she asks Cedric for help.
episodes.title: Cedric's Apprentice

episodes.synopsis: The Golden Wing Circus returns to Enchancia and the kids want to see it. But James breaks a window playing ball in the castle.
episodes.title: A Royal Mess

episodes.synopsis: The kids at school are assigned the task of designing the castle of their dreams, but it's a group project and the teachers select the partners.
episodes.title: The Shy Princess

episodes.synopsis: Sofia enters Clover in the Village Faire pet contest and learns an important lesson in friendship after inadvertently hurting his feelings.
episodes.title: Blue Ribbon Bunny

episodes.synopsis: It's the day of the big princess test. Everyone gets ready with their best dresses. Mrs. Higgins asks for help, but everyone's too busy to help her.
episodes.title: The Princess Test

episodes.synopsis: Baileywick's brother Nigel comes to visit for his birthday. The King gives him the day off, but every time they try to leave, someone asks for help.
episodes.title: Baileywick's Day Off

episodes.synopsis: The Kingdoms of Wei-Ling, Khaldoun and Enchancia meet to celebrate a royal picnic and a day of outdoor games. James asks Sofia to be his teammate.
episodes.title: Tri-Kingdom Picnic

episodes.synopsis: It's Jade's birthday and she prepares a party and the whole town's invited, except Lucinda, the witch, who treats everyone badly.
episodes.title: The Little Witch

episodes.synopsis: Everyone goes to the land of Tangu to visit Zandar. He's getting ready to throw a big party with magic carpets.
episodes.title: Two to Tangu

episodes.synopsis: Clover thinks Sofia doesn't have time for him, so he decides to go to a wizard who can turn him into a magic rabbit.
episodes.title: Finding Clover

episodes.synopsis: Sofia and Amber take a jewel for the royal ball. One of the griffins, the creatures who guard the jewels, escapes.
episodes.title: The Amulet of Avalor

episodes.synopsis: Sofia wants to go on a hike with her Buttercup troop, but King Roland insists on sending Baileywick, the castle steward, to keep Sofia safe.
episodes.title: The Buttercups

episodes.synopsis: A new fairy teacher, Miss Nettle, who was once the apprentice of Flora, Fauna and Merryweather, arrives at Royal Prep to be a teacher for the after-school gardening club.
episodes.title: Make Way for Miss Nettle

episodes.synopsis: When Sofia brags about being chosen to sing the Enchancian anthem, her amulet puts a curse on her, which she must learn to undo.
episodes.title: The Amulet and the Anthem

episodes.synopsis: When Sofia is selected to host a Royal Prep tea party, Amber encourages her to "think big" to impress the princes and princesses.
episodes.title: Tea for Too Many

episodes.synopsis: The students at Royal Prep must make their own costumes for this year's All Hallows' Eve costume contest.
episodes.title: Princess Butterfly

episodes.synopsis: When Sofia reluctantly agrees to help her seemingly dotty Aunt Tilly bake an apple pie, she thinks she's in for a boring day.
episodes.title: Great Aunt-Venture

episodes.synopsis: King Roland finds an enchanted mirror in the castle attic, then, unaware of the mirror's magical properties, makes a wish for a simple life as a village baker.
episodes.title: The Baker King

episodes.synopsis: During her family vacation on a floating palace, Sofia arrives at a special cove and befriends a curious young mermaid.
episodes.title: The Floating Palace: Pt. 1

episodes.synopsis: Sofia tries to find a way to convince her parents to move the floating palace to save the mermaid kingdom -- without telling them about the mermaids.
episodes.title: The Floating Palace: Pt. 2

episodes.synopsis: When a snowstorm prevents King Roland from returning home in time for the holidays, Sofia leads her family on a brave expedition to find him.
episodes.title: Holiday in Enchancia

episodes.synopsis: Sofia invites Jade and Ruby, her village friends, to join her and her sister, Amber, in the Flylight Pageant, an annual parade of flying coaches.
episodes.title: Four's a Crowd

episodes.synopsis: Sofia doesn't want to share her birthday with James anymore, so she asks Cedric to cast a spell giving them different birthdays.
episodes.title: Two Princesses and a Baby

episodes.synopsis: When the evil fairy, Miss Nettle, tries to steal her amulet during the Enchanted Feast, Sofia gets some help from Snow White.
episodes.title: The Enchanted Feast

episodes.synopsis: When an injury keeps James from competing in the flying derby championship, Sofia must team up with Prince Hugo.
episodes.title: The Flying Crown

episodes.synopsis: Sofia doesn't want to share her mother with her siblings at a Mother's Day picnic and asks Lucinda to cast a spell giving the two of them time alone.
episodes.title: Mom's the Word

episodes.synopsis: Sofia gets to meet her hero, Sir Bartleby, who doesn't speak because of his unusual voice, and introduces him to her Aunt Tilly.
episodes.title: The Silent Knight

episodes.synopsis: As the Enchanted Science Fair nears, Sofia and her classmates pair up to find magical objects atop a mountain, a quest that tests their friendship.
episodes.title: Enchanted Science Fair

episodes.synopsis: With his parents away, James is made king for the day, but things get out of hand when he refuses to take the job seriously.
episodes.title: King for a Day

episodes.synopsis: A jealous Amber makes a wish that Roland becomes allergic to Sofia but she doesn't mean to turn Sofia into a cat!
episodes.title: When You Wish Upon a Well

episodes.synopsis: When Sofia meets Gwen, a young kitchen maid with a talent for inventing, she encourages her to follow her creative dreams.
episodes.title: Gizmo Gwen

episodes.synopsis: Sofia uses a spell to make a double of herself so she can be in two places at once, but the copy ends up causing trouble at the Highland Hootenanny.
episodes.title: Sofia the Second

episodes.synopsis: Sofia joins Cedric for a visit to a sorcerers' retirement home, where he hopes to earn his father's respect and his family's magic wand.
episodes.title: Mystic Meadows

episodes.synopsis: When James and Prince Jin become trapped in the kingdom of Wei-Ling, Sofia, Amber and Jun team up with Mulan to rescue them.
episodes.title: Princesses to the Rescue!

episodes.synopsis: A ghost is scaring everyone away from Sofia's big Halloween bash, but she soon discovers that he just wants to host a party of his own.
episodes.title: Ghostly Gala

episodes.synopsis: When Sofia and Hildegard become trapped inside a magic painting, Hildegard's know-it-all attitude complicates their escape.
episodes.title: The Princess Stays in the Picture

episodes.synopsis: Two princesses arrive in Enchancia, each claiming to own an emerald key that Sofia found. Which is the real princess, and which the imposter?
episodes.title: The Emerald Key

episodes.synopsis: Sofia and her classmates bring their pets to school, where they get "scrambled" during an experiment in sorcery class.
episodes.title: Scrambled Pets

episodes.synopsis: A new steward casts a spell on Baileywick, hoping to steal his job. But Sofia helps to make sure her friend doesn't fall into the trap.
episodes.title: Baileywhoops

episodes.synopsis: Jealous of Sofia's magic amulet, Amber steals it for herself, a deed that unleashes the wicked Princess Ivy who wants to take over Enchancia.
episodes.title: The Curse of Princess Ivy: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: While evil Princess Ivy tries to destroy the amulet, Amber turns to Sofia and Rapunzel for help defeating Ivy and saving Enchancia.
episodes.title: The Curse of Princess Ivy: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: While looking for the perfect Wassailia gift for Cedric, Sofia meets a faun in the woods who's suffering from a terrible curse.
episodes.title: Winter's Gift

episodes.synopsis: Crackle would love to sing in the Leafsong Festival but fears that she'll have to give up her fire-breathing ability to participate.
episodes.title: The Leafsong Festival

episodes.synopsis: When Cedric steps in to teach Sofia's sorcery class, a group of his former students play a series of pranks that threatens to get out of hand.
episodes.title: Substitute Cedric

episodes.synopsis: After water floods his home, Clover moves in with Sofia. The princess is delighted, at least until Clover proves how untidy he can be.
episodes.title: Clover Time

episodes.synopsis: Hoping to win a big race, Ruby asks fairy godmother Tizzy to lend a hand. But the fairy's super-enthusiastic help makes Ruby sorry she ever asked.
episodes.title: In a Tizzy

episodes.synopsis: When the villagers take on the royal court in a game of dazzleball, Sofia must choose whose team to join -- her friends' or her family's.
episodes.title: A Tale of Two Teams

episodes.synopsis: Sofia's amulet magically lets her become tiny in order to save three sprites. But when she misbehaves, the amulet won't let her return to normal size.
episodes.title: The Littlest Princess

episodes.synopsis: Amber joins a troop of Butternut scouts, but a grungy overnight trip proves challenging for the princess who prefers to remain pristine.
episodes.title: Buttercup Amber

episodes.synopsis: Sofia tries to do a good deed to prove that the royal family cares about the villagers, but a local hero's jealous follower thwarts her efforts.
episodes.title: Carol of the Arrow

episodes.synopsis: Though Sofia encourages her to try out for the school musical, gifted singer Clio hesitates because she's afraid her friend Hildegard will disapprove.
episodes.title: Sidekick Clio

episodes.synopsis: It's up to Sofia and her royal siblings to save the day when a young wizard lures Minimus and Enchancia's other flying horses away with a magic lute.
episodes.title: Minimus is Missing

episodes.synopsis: Sofia's friend Prince Hugo loves to ice dance, but he's afraid of what his father, King Garrick, will think. Can Sofia help her pal follow his heart?
episodes.title: Lord of the Rink
